Blood 9

Infernal Tempest
Ritual
B5A2
spell id [id]: 1119
effect number [effect_number]: 1
damage [damage]: 632
number of effects [nreff]: 1002
gems required [gemcost]: 50B
Summon Units:#632 Storm Demon x 7+
The caster unleashes an infernal tempest. With the gale come several Storm Demons bent on wreaking havoc. The caster binds them to his service before they can destroy his laboratory. Storm Demons are devils of the tempest realm. The bodies of the Storm Demons consist partly of storm clouds. They are ethereal and can unleash blasts of infernal lightning upon their enemies.
